title: FREAKS! Pedophile-pervs target schoolchildren tele-schooling during COVID
itunes:title: FREAKS! Pedophile-pervs target schoolchildren tele-schooling during COVID
description:
Police are cracking down on alleged sexual predators as they target children who are online more, thanks to tele-schooling due to COVID quarantine. Recently, over 30 people in the state of Virginia have been arrested as part of an operation code-named "COVID Crackdown."

The ages of those arrested ranged between 20 and 74. They are charged with solicitation of a minor and attempted indecent liberties

With Nancy Grace today.

  • Alicia Kozakiewicz - SURVIVOR
  • Titania Jordan CMO Chief Marketing Office/Chief Parenting Office
  • Detective Rich Wistocki
  • Derek Ellington - Expert in online activity, Certified Fraud examiner, Certified video forensics expert, licensed Private Investigator
  • Dr. Bethany Marshall - Psychoanalyst, Beverly Hills
  • Nicole Partin - CrimeOnline Investigative Reporter


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
